page.title: 07GAINFORD C.E.SCHOOL SURVEY
page.content: A survey was carried out in Gainford by the children at the local primary school. The children asked their parents to complete a questionnaire dealing with various aspects of life, such as employment, housing and recreation. {Employment} 1 52% of fathers worked more than 10 miles from the village, and 8% were unemployed. 2 36% of mothers were housewives. 3 60% of fathers had professional occupations, 4% had non-skilled jobs. 4 44% of mothers regarded their occupations as non-skilled. 5 Travelling to work, 84% used private transport, 12% walked and 4% used public transport.
